EmailTemplate.name: Consent Letter
EmailTemplate.subject: Consent Letter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom for your business document needs.
The purpose of this email is to inform you that additional information is required before we can proceed with the submission of your documents to the State. Before we can move forward with the name selection you have provided, you must first obtain a consent letter. An acceptable consent letter is one that:
1. Written on company letterhead of the consenting company 2. Includes that name and address of the consenting company 3. Signature from a member or manager (if consenting entity is an LLC) or an officer such as a President or Treasurer (if consenting entity is a Corporation) 4. Gives consent to LegalZoom and the customer to use the consenting name to file the entity on your behalf
If there are any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact our Customer Care Team at (800) 773-0888 or by simply replying to this email.
Thank you again for choosing LegalZoom for your business document needs.
{!snippetVariable.cccontactline} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccassistline} {!snippetVariable.ccphone}. {!snippetVariable.ourrr} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccbizhourline} {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
{!snippetVariable.ccsincerely}
{!snippetVariable.cclegalzoomline} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccphone} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address} {!snippetVariable.lz_website}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
